title: Katie Price stripped NAKED in a cab after wild night out at Chris Eubank Jr's boozy birthday bash
text:
She's been raising eyebrows of late as her turbulent love life continues to dominate the headlines.

And Katie Price set tongues wagging once more as it's been revealed that she stripped naked in the back of an Uber following a wild night out at Chris Eubank Jr's birthday party.

The 41-year-old former glamour model's antics were exposed by her pal on her YouTube channel, with Katie seemingly shocked by what she got up to.

Cheeky! Katie Price, 41, set tongues wagging once more as it's been revealed that she stripped naked in the back of an Uber following a wild night out at Chris Eubank Jr's birthday party

In the clip, Katie could be seen getting her hair washed by long-time friend and hairdresser Melodie Pope, with the duo reminiscing about the fun they had at the boxer's boozy 30th birthday bash last month.

Questioning her pal about what she got up to, Katie asked: 'What did I do in the Uber?'

To which Melodie replied: 'Stripped off naked. Everything.'

Seemingly floored by the revelation, the star exclaimed: 'I didn't, don't lie! Not my trousers?!'

Say what?! The ex glamour model's antics were exposed by her pal on her YouTube channel, with Katie seemingly shocked by what she got up to (pictured leaving the party in September)

After Melodie confirmed her cheeky actions, Katie asked: 'What did I put on?'

She replied: 'You swore that you'd been given a tracksuit from Chris Eubank, but it was just a T-shirt, so you slept in your T-shirt all the way home!'

The pair then had a giggle about Katie's hazy memory of the fun-filled, wild night, with Katie adding: 'You're joking!'

Katie stripping moment comes after she had been seen making a swift exit from her ex Kris Boyson's home on Tuesday morning.

Exposed: Katie could be seen getting her hair washed by long-time friend and hairdresser Melodie Pope, with the duo reminiscing about the fun they had at the boozy bash last month

Revealed: Questioning her pal about what she got up to, Katie asked: 'What did I do in the Uber?' To which Melodie replied: 'Stripped off naked. Everything'

Joined by the fitness trainer as she sneaked out of his abode in Kent at 8am for the school run, the ex model cut an incredibly dishevelled appearance.

Speaking of the surprise visit to her ex, it has now been claimed that the mother-of-five realises she is now 'in hot water' with her toyboy lover Charles Drury, whom she left behind in her mucky Horsham mansion.

A source told Metro.co.uk: 'Katie was totally caught out with these pictures. They’ve been in contact longer than they’ve let on and maybe bumping into each other at Thorpe Park was more a stunt than a coincidence’.

It was also added by the insider: 'She lied to Charles. Katie was totally caught out. She’s in hot water, they’ve been sneaking behind people’s back and it’s not cool.’

OMG! Seemingly floored by the revelation, the star exclaimed: 'I didn't, don't lie! Not my trousers?!'

Fun night: 'You swore that you'd been given a tracksuit from Chris Eubank, but it was just a T-shirt, so you slept in your T-shirt all the way home!' (pictured with Chris Eubank Jr in September)

It was the first time that Katie and Kris had been seen together since bumping into each other at Thorpe Park two weeks ago.

And Katie was seen cutting a low-key figure in a light blue jumper and casual bottoms.

Her locks, which appeared to be long extensions, were unkempt, and she went mostly make-up free for the early morning school run.

She was joined by Kris, who was dressed for comfort in a Adidas black and white tracksuit.

Busted: Katie stripping moment comes after she had been seen making a swift exit from her ex Kris Boyson's home on Tuesday morning (pictured July 2018)

Clash: Following their run-in at Thorpe Park, Kris allegedly showed up at Katie's 'mucky mansion' to collect his things - but encountered her and builder Charles, who is staying there

Following their run-in at Thorpe Park, personal trainer Kris allegedly showed up at Katie's 'mucky mansion' to collect his things - but encountered her and builder beau Charles, who is staying there.

A source told The Sun: 'Katie said she was going to send his stuff to him and that he wasn't to collect it, but Kris came to the house with a group of blokes.

'She gave him two bin bags full of his things, but the whole thing descended into a showdown between him and Charles.

'At one point Kris told him, 'I will break your legs, little boy. The whole thing was so unexpected - moments earlier they'd just been watching TV inside.'

Katie lives in the mansion with her five children - Jett, five and Bunny four, whose father is her ex husband Kieran Hayler, son Junior, 14, and daughter Princess, 12, from her marriage to Peter Andre and Harvey, 17, whose father is Dwight Yorke.
description: It's been revealed that the former glamour model, 41, stripped naked in the back of an Uber following a wild night out at Chris Eubank Jr's birthday party last month.
